caption: The captain asked passengers to take their personal belongings off the plane, share them with each other, and overcome difficulties together. Someone asked why they couldn't stay in the planeï¼Œthe captain told him that the temperature of the plane was very high and it wasn't safe there. The captain walked up to the criminal and started chatting with him. He hoped that the criminal could cooperate with them, but the criminal said he wanted to release his handcuffs first, the captain did not agree. Afterwards, the captain returned to the plane and started to remove the body from the cabin. Meanwhile, he took the police officer's gun and the criminal's personal stuff.
